tags.name: ef-interactive-chart
tags.description:
A charting component that allows you to create several use cases of financial chart.
By lightweight-charts library.

attributes.name: disabled-jump-button
attributes.description: Hide jump to latest data button

attributes.name: legend-style
attributes.description:
Set legend style i.e. `horizontal`, `vertical`.
Default is `vertical`.

properties.name: disabledJumpButton
properties.description: Hide jump to latest data button

properties.name: legendStyle
properties.description:
Set legend style i.e. `horizontal`, `vertical`.
Default is `vertical`.

properties.name: seriesList
properties.description: Array of series instances in chart

slots.name: legend
slots.description: Slot to use for implementing custom legend.

methods.name: colors
methods.description: List of available chart colors from the theme.
